dict.acceptation: 老的；古老的；以前的；（用于指称被替代的东西）原来的；

sent.orig: I love everything that's old ------ old friends, old times, old manners, old looks, old wine.
sent.trans: 我喜欢一切老旧的东西：老朋友，旧时光，老习俗，老面孔，陈年老窖。

sent.orig: You collect old furniture, old cars, old pictures, everything old but old people.
sent.trans: 你们收集老的家具，老爷车，古老的油画但就不包括老年人。

sent.orig: Old habits will come -- and old habits are very old, many, many lives old.
sent.trans: 旧的习性会升起––并且旧的习性是非常的根深蒂固的，它有许多、许多世那麽老。

sent.orig: One day an old, old lion realized that he was old to1 hunt for food.
sent.trans: 有一天，一只非常老的狮子发现自己已经老的不能捕猎食物了。

sent.orig: Company of old culture house, food, old cinema, it is opposite of old county Party committee.
sent.trans: 老文化馆、饮食公司、老电影院，就在老县委的对面。
